===Etymology===
From {{com|ja|象|海豹|tr1=zō|tr2=azarashi|t1={{l|en|elephant}}|t2={{l|en|earless seal}}}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> The {{m|ja|海豹}} spelling is {{juku|sort=そうあざらし'}}.
